page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: There is no predominant type of farming in this area (neither arable nor livestock).Most of the crops grown are cash crops which change year by year. There are two large farms in the area and several smaller ones.The larger ones are mainly arable with a few sheep for grazing. There are few herds of cattle though there is a dairy unit in{Hope Mansell.}As well as this there is a Turkey unit which is also used to breed pheasants for a shoot in{Warmhill Wood. { }In the past few years there has been an increase in potatoe growing especially along the side of{Castle {Brook}which is used for irrigation during the summer. As well as this there has been some experimentation with beet and maize (for stock).
